ground_truth: She looks at the floor. He raises his glass, then turns away, popping the fangs back in his mouth as he makes his way through the crowd. Alison has her back to him. A morose Sydney sits alone at the table, his goblet-like glass in front. Vincent and Elena sit in the back. Elena winds the window down. Vincent leans forward. Sydney steps back from the car window and knits his hands together by his chin. Drenched by the rain, he stares at them with window glides up. Elena smiles at the driver. The car pulls away, leaving a dispirited Sydney at the roadside, his hands clasped together, as if in prayer. His long cape hangs in a puddle on the pavement. He looks up at an electronic billboard from which Sophie stares at him. She blows a kiss. Breathing heavily, he hangs his head as the rain beats down on the dark street. In Clayton's office, Sydney smiles. Dressed in a sharp pin-striped suit and dark glasses, Sydney sits opposite Vincent in a sushi bar, hurriedly taking notes and smiling enthusiastically at Vincent's comments. Elena goes through Sydney's article, editing out the parts she doesn't like. She hands it back to him. He nods with a grateful smile as he looks it over. Sydney stands behind Elena and a dark-haired woman as they airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer. They digitally remove a pimple. Sydney takes a copy of Sharp's magazine from a news kiosk on a street corner. He flips through it to find his article. A broad smile spreads over Sydney’s face. Sydney works at his computer in an office, his own. Over time, it fills up with various gift baskets. A female property agent shows Sydney around a spacious apartment. Someone hands Sydney a gift box at his desk, the new Omega Speedmaster watch. He takes off his old watch and flings it. Sydney's name is taped on a number of guest lists. Getting on like a house on fire, Sydney and Clayton share a joke in the lift. Wearing a white robe, Sydney sits in a steam room. A wide smile plays on his lips. Alison reads an article on Sydney in a magazine. She's sitting at a restaurant table. Lawrence joins her. On it is a white Russian cocktail. He reads over her shoulder. Lawrence removes his arm from around her shoulder, picks up his drink and takes a sip. As he walks away, Alison glances down at her novel and frowns. The exterior of Sydney's apartment building. Alison is inside the building. Wearing a stripey robe, Sydney opens his door. Alison nods. Alison throws her head back with a sigh as he fetches some documents.

A somber Sydney sits alone with his goblet-like glass. Vincent and Elena sit in the back. Elena lowers the window. Vincent leans forward. Sydney steps back from the car window, hands knitted by his chin, staring as the window closes. Elena smiles at the driver. The car departs, leaving Sydney at the roadside, his hands clasped like in prayer, his cape trailing in a puddle. He looks up at an electronic billboard where Sophie blows a kiss. Breathing heavily, he bows his head as rain pours on the dark street. Elena edits Sydney's article, removing parts she dislikes, and hands it back. He nods gratefully. Sydney works at his office, gradually filled with gift baskets. A female agent shows him a spacious apartment. Sydney receives a gift box at his desk—the new Omega Speedmaster watch—and discards his old one. His name shows up on multiple guest lists. Sydney and Clayton bond in the lift. test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: She looks at the floor as he pops fangs into his mouth and moves through the crowd. Alison faces away from him. Morose Sydney sits alone with a goblet-like glass. Vincent and Elena sit at the back; she winds down the window. Sydney steps back from the car, hands knit by his chin, drenched by rain. Elena smiles at the driver as the car leaves, Sydney's cape in a puddle. He looks at a billboard, Sophie blows a kiss. In Clayton's office, Sydney smiles in a pin-striped suit, taking notes from Vincent. Elena edits his article, and he nods gratefully. Sydney observes as Vincent's photos are airbrushed. Sydney buys Sharp's magazine, smiles at his article. His office fills with gift baskets. A property agent shows him an apartment. Sydney receives an Omega Speedmaster watch, discarding his old one. His name appears on guest lists. In a steam room, he shares a joke with Clayton. Alison reads about Sydney in a magazine at a restaurant with Lawrence, who sips his drink before leaving. Sydney opens the door of his apartment to Alison, who nods and sighs as he fetches documents.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
She directs her gaze downward, focusing intently on the floor beneath her feet. Meanwhile, he lifts his glass ceremoniously and then turns away from her, seamlessly slipping his fangs back into his mouth while navigating his path through the bustling crowd. Unaware of his presence, Alison stands motionlessly with her back turned to him. Sitting alone at a table, Sydney appears despondent, staring vacantly at the goblet-like glass positioned before him. Meanwhile, Vincent and Elena are settled comfortably in the back. Elena lowers the window, letting in a gentle breeze as Vincent leans forward in his seat. Sydney, now stepping back from the car window, brings his hands together, interlocking them thoughtfully by his chin. Drenched by the relentless rain, he peers at them solemnly as the window gradually glides up, effectively closing him off. Elena offers a pleasant smile to the driver. The car smoothly pulls away from the curb, leaving the already dispirited Sydney standing on the roadside, his hands still clasped together as if he were saying a silent prayer. His long, flowing cape is left trailing in a puddle on the wet pavement. He lifts his gaze toward an electronic billboard displaying Sophie's image. She playfully blows him a kiss. Breathing heavily with a sense of weariness, he lowers his head while the rain persistently falls on the dimly lit street. 

Inside the confines of Clayton's office, a transformed Sydney is seen smiling. Dressed impeccably in a sharp pin-striped suit, complemented by dark glasses, Sydney sits facing Vincent in a bustling sushi bar. He eagerly takes notes, his smile broadening with genuine enthusiasm as Vincent shares his comments. Meanwhile, Elena meticulously reviews Sydney's article, editing out the parts that do not meet her standards. She returns it to him, and he nods appreciatively, casting her a grateful smile as he carefully looks over the revised document. Sydney stands behind Elena and a dark-haired woman, observing as they expertly airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer screen, deftly removing a noticeable pimple. Later, Sydney retrieves a copy of Sharp's magazine from a news kiosk situated on a street corner. He flips through the pages until he finds his article, and a broad, triumphant smile spreads across his face. Sydney diligently works at his computer in his own office, which gradually fills with a variety of gift baskets over time.

A female property agent takes Sydney on a tour around a spacious apartment, showcasing its features. Back at his desk, an unknown person hands him a gift box containing the coveted new Omega Speedmaster watch. He removes his old watch and, with a feeling of liberation, flings it aside. Sydney's name appears taped on numerous guest lists. Getting along exceptionally well, Sydney and Clayton exchange a joke while sharing a lift. Clad in a white robe, Sydney relaxes in a steam room, a wide, contented smile gracing his lips. In a restaurant, Alison reads an article about Sydney in a magazine, while seated at a table. Lawrence joins her, with a white Russian cocktail before him. He casually reads over her shoulder. Momentarily, Lawrence removes his arm from around her shoulder, picks up his drink, and takes a leisurely sip. As he departs, Alison glances down at her novel, her expression shifting to a frown. The scene transitions to the exterior of Sydney's apartment building. Inside, Alison makes her way through the building. As she approaches, Sydney, wearing a stripey robe, opens his door. Alison acknowledges him with a nod. She throws her head back with a sigh as he retrieves some documents, capturing a moment of intermingled emotions.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
She directs her gaze downward, with a focused and intense stare fixed on the floor beneath her feet. Meanwhile, he ceremoniously lifts his drink, raising the glass in a deliberate manner, before turning his attention away from her completely. In a seamless motion, he retracts his fangs back into his mouth while skillfully maneuvering his way through the bustling, energetic crowd that surrounds him. Unaware of his presence or actions, Alison stands perfectly still, remaining motionless with her back turned toward him. Seated alone at a table, Sydney appears despondent, staring vacantly into the distance at the goblet-like glass positioned directly before him, lost in his own thoughts. Meanwhile, situated comfortably in the back, Vincent and Elena are settled into their seats. Elena lowers the window, allowing a gentle, refreshing breeze to flow in as Vincent leans forward in his seat. Sydney, now having stepped back from the car window, brings his hands thoughtfully together, interlocking his fingers by his chin as if in contemplation. Drenched by the relentless rain pouring down, he peers solemnly at them as the window gradually glides up, quietly closing him off from them. Elena offers a pleasant and amiable smile to the driver. The car glides smoothly away from the curb, leaving the already dispirited Sydney standing forlornly on the roadside. His hands remain clasped together as though he is engaged in a silent prayer. His long, flowing cape is forlornly left trailing in a puddle on the wet pavement. He lifts his gaze toward an electronic billboard, which prominently displays Sophie's image. She playfully blows him a kiss from the screen. Breathing heavily with a growing sense of weariness, he lowers his head as the steady rain continues to fall on the dimly lit street around him.

Within the confines of Clayton's office, a transformed Sydney is seen with a welcoming smile across his face. Dressed impeccably in a sharp pin-striped suit, complemented by stylish dark glasses, Sydney sits across from Vincent in a bustling and vibrant sushi bar. He eagerly takes detailed notes, his smile broadening with genuine enthusiasm as Vincent shares insightful comments with him. Meanwhile, Elena meticulously reviews Sydney's written article, carefully editing out the parts that do not meet her high standards. She hands it back to him, and he nods appreciatively, casting her a grateful and warm smile as he attentively reviews the revised document. Sydney stands behind Elena and a woman with dark hair, observing as they expertly airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer screen, deftly removing a noticeable pimple with precision. Later on, Sydney retrieves a copy of Sharp's magazine from a news kiosk conveniently situated on a street corner. He flips through the pages with eagerness until he finds his published article, and a broad, triumphant smile spreads across his face as he takes in his accomplishment. Sydney diligently works at his computer in his own office, which gradually fills with a delightful assortment of various gift baskets over time.

A female property agent takes Sydney on an enthusiastic tour around a spacious, well-appointed apartment, showcasing its numerous appealing features. Back at his desk, an unknown person presents him with a gift box containing the coveted, sought-after new Omega Speedmaster watch. He removes his old watch with a feeling of liberation and joy, flinging it aside with abandon. Sydney's name begins to appear taped on numerous guest lists, marking his rising prominence. Getting along exceptionally well, Sydney and Clayton exchange a light-hearted joke while they share a ride in a lift together. Clad in a comfortable white robe, Sydney relaxes in a steam room, a wide, contented smile gracing his lips as he enjoys the tranquility. At a restaurant, Alison reads an intriguing article about Sydney in a magazine, while seated at a table. Lawrence joins her at the table, with a white Russian cocktail sitting before him. He casually reads over her shoulder, showing interest. Momentarily, Lawrence removes his arm from around her shoulder, then picks up his drink, and takes a leisurely sip. As he departs, Alison glances down at her novel, her expression shifting to a contemplative frown. The scene transitions smoothly to the exterior of Sydney's apartment building. Inside the building, Alison purposefully makes her way through the corridors. As she approaches, Sydney, wearing a comfortable stripey robe, opens his door to her. Alison acknowledges him with a nod, a silent greeting exchanged between them. She throws her head back with a deep sigh as he retrieves some documents, capturing a moment of mixed and intermingled emotions.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She directs her gaze downward towards the floor while he deftly raises his glass, bringing it to his lips before turning away. As he navigates through the bustling crowd, he discreetly pops the fangs back into his mouth. Nearby, Alison stands with her back turned to him, unaware of his actions. Seated alone at a table, Sydney appears somber, with a goblet-like glass set before him. In the back, Vincent and Elena sit together, absorbed in their own world. Elena reaches over and winds the car window down, allowing the fresh air to flow in. Vincent shifts his position, leaning forward slightly. As the window becomes a barrier once more, Sydney steps back from the car, placing his hands together by his chin in a gesture of uncertainty. The rain pours down relentlessly, soaking him as he stares intently at the car. With the window gliding up, Elena flashes a warm smile at the driver. The car then pulls away into the distance, leaving a disheartened Sydney standing forlornly at the roadside. His hands remain clasped together as if in silent prayer, and his long cape trails behind him, dipping into a growing puddle on the pavement. Lifting his gaze, he notices an electronic billboard where Sophie captures his attention, blowing him a playful kiss. Overwhelmed by the moment, he lowers his head, breathing heavily while the rain continues to batter the dark, glistening street. Later, within the confines of Clayton's office, Sydney allows a smile to break across his face. Clad in a sharp pin-striped suit and sporting dark glasses, Sydney sits opposite Vincent in a sushi bar. He listens intently, taking notes swiftly while nodding in agreement and smiling enthusiastically at Vincent’s insightful remarks. Meanwhile, Elena meticulously reviews Sydney’s article, her editor’s eye scanning for sections to modify. She edits out the parts she deems unnecessary and hands it back to him. Sydney accepts it with a grateful nod and an appreciative smile, reviewing the changes she made. Standing behind Elena and a dark-haired colleague, Sydney watches as they airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer, paying close attention as they digitally remove a pimple from the image. At a street corner news kiosk, Sydney picks up a copy of Sharp's magazine and eagerly flips through it to locate his article. A broad smile of satisfaction lights up his face upon finding it. In his personal office, Sydney diligently works at his computer, the space gradually filling up over time with an assortment of gift baskets. A female property agent shows Sydney around a spacious, luxurious apartment, pointing out its many features. Later, someone places a gift box on his desk, revealing a new Omega Speedmaster watch. He removes the watch he’s wearing and with a carefree gesture, flings it aside. Sydney's name appears prominently on several guest lists, a testament to his growing influence. Enjoying each other's company, Sydney and Clayton share a joke as they ride in a lift together, their camaraderie evident in their laughter. Relaxing in a steam room, Sydney dons a white robe, the warmth enveloping him, and a wide, contented smile graces his lips. Elsewhere, Alison, seated at a restaurant table, peruses a magazine featuring an article on Sydney. Lawrence approaches and slides into the seat next to her, glancing at the article she’s engrossed in. Resting his arm around her shoulders, Lawrence reads over her shoulder for a moment, then pulls his arm back as he retrieves his drink. Taking a considerate sip, he walks away, leaving Alison to return her attention to her novel with a frown. The exterior of Sydney's apartment building comes into view, signifying the passage of time. Inside the building, Alison makes her way up to Sydney’s apartment. As he opens the door dressed in a stripey robe, Alison acknowledges him with a nod. She throws her head back, exhaling with a sigh as he goes to fetch some documents, creating a moment of shared anticipation.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
She observes the floor as he raises his glass, turns away, and discreetly fits his fangs back in while maneuvering through the crowd. Alison, unaware, stands with her back to him as Sydney sits alone, morosely watching with a goblet in front of him. In the back, Vincent and Elena are seated as she unwinds the window and Vincent leans forward. A drenched Sydney steps back from the car window, clasps his hands together beneath his chin, and stares at them as the window rises. Elena smiles at the driver as the car departs, leaving Sydney looking forlorn by the roadside, his cape trailing in a puddle. He glances up at an electronic billboard where Sophie blows him a kiss. Despondent, he lowers his head, rain pouring over the dark street.

Later, Sydney beams in Clayton's office, later seen in a sushi bar, smartly dressed, energetically taking notes opposite Vincent. Elena reviews and edits Sydney's article before handing it back, and he nods appreciatively. Sydney oversees Elena and another woman as they airbrush Vincent's photos, digitally removing a pimple. At a news kiosk, Sydney discovers his published article in Sharp's magazine and smiles broadly. His office gradually fills with gift baskets as he works. A female property agent shows him a spacious apartment, and he receives a new Omega Speedmaster watch at his desk, promptly discarding his old one. Sydney's influence grows, his name appearing on numerous guest lists, and he shares a joke with Clayton in a lift. In a steam room, Sydney relaxes with a contented smile.

Meanwhile, Alison reads a magazine article on Sydney at a restaurant as Lawrence joins her, sipping his white Russian cocktail and reading over her shoulder. After he leaves, Alison returns to her novel with a frown. Later, Alison visits Sydney's apartment building, where he greets her in a stripey robe, nodding as she arrives. She sighs as he retrieves some documents.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She looks at the floor, a patterned carpet in a crowded ballroom known for lavish parties. He raises his glass, crystal etched with intricate designs, then turns away, popping the fangs back in his mouth as he makes his way through the crowd of costumed guests. Alison has her back to him, unaware of his presence at the masquerade event. A morose Sydney sits alone at the table, his goblet-like glass in front, reminiscent of medieval banquets. Vincent and Elena sit in the back of a vintage car. Elena winds the window down, letting in the cool night air of the bustling city street. Vincent leans forward, keenly observing the lively nightlife outside. Sydney steps back from the car window, parked near a historic theater, and knits his hands together by his chin. Drenched by the rain, a typical torrential downpour in this coastal city, he stares at them with window glides up. Elena smiles at the driver, a familiar chauffeur who has served the family for years. The car pulls away, leaving a dispirited Sydney at the roadside, his hands clasped together, as if in prayer. His long cape, part of his unique fashion statement, hangs in a puddle on the pavement. He looks up at an electronic billboard from which Sophie, a famous pop star, stares at him. She blows a kiss, a signature move from her latest music video. Breathing heavily, he hangs his head as the rain beats down on the dark street, illuminated by the flickering neon lights of nearby shops. In Clayton's office, located in a high-rise building downtown, Sydney smiles. Dressed in a sharp pin-striped suit and dark glasses, Sydney sits opposite Vincent in a sushi bar, a trendy spot known for its avant-garde décor, hurriedly taking notes and smiling enthusiastically at Vincent's comments. Elena goes through Sydney's article, editing out the parts she doesn't like, ensuring it meets the magazine's high standards. She hands it back to him. He nods with a grateful smile as he looks it over. Sydney stands behind Elena and a dark-haired woman as they airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer, using cutting-edge graphic design software. They digitally remove a pimple. Sydney takes a copy of Sharp's magazine, renowned for its in-depth celebrity interviews, from a news kiosk on a street corner. He flips through it to find his article. A broad smile spreads over Sydney’s face, reflecting his satisfaction with seeing his work published. Sydney works at his computer in an office, his own, filled with awards and mementos of his career. Over time, it fills up with various gift baskets from admirers. A female property agent shows Sydney around a spacious apartment, located in an exclusive part of town with a stunning view of the skyline. Someone hands Sydney a gift box at his desk, the prestigious new Omega Speedmaster watch, coveted by watch enthusiasts. He takes off his old watch and flings it, a symbolic gesture of moving on to new beginnings. Sydney's name is taped on a number of guest lists for elite social events. Getting on like a house on fire, Sydney and Clayton share a joke in the lift, lightening the mood on their way to an important meeting. Wearing a white robe, Sydney sits in a steam room, a luxurious retreat at a private spa. A wide smile plays on his lips. Alison reads an article on Sydney in a magazine, amazed at his rapid rise to fame. She's sitting at a restaurant table known for its exquisite brunch menu. Lawrence joins her. On it is a white Russian cocktail, a favorite drink of the patrons here. He reads over her shoulder. Lawrence removes his arm from around her shoulder, picks up his drink and takes a sip. As he walks away, Alison glances down at her novel, a mystery thriller, and frowns. The exterior of Sydney's apartment building, a modern architectural marvel, catches her eye. Alison is inside the building. Wearing a stripey robe, Sydney opens his door. Alison nods, acknowledging the fresh start he is making. Alison throws her head back with a sigh as he fetches some documents, important papers related to his next big project.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: She looks at the floor. He raises his glass then turns away popping the fangs back in his mouth as he makes his way through the crowd. Alison has her back to him. A morose Sydney sits alone at the table his gobletlike glass in front. Vincent and Elena sit in the back. Elena winds the window down. Vincent leans forward. Sydney steps back from the car window and knits his hands together by his chin. Drenched by the rain he stares at them with window glides up. Elena smiles at the driver. The car pulls away leaving a dispirited Sydney at the roadside his hands clasped together as if in prayer. His long cape hangs in a puddle on the pavement. He looks up at an electronic billboard from which Sophie stares at him. She blows a kiss. Breathing heavily he hangs his head as the rain beats down on the dark street. In Clayton's office Sydney smiles. Dressed in a sharp pinstriped suit and dark glasses. Sydney sits opposite Vincent in a sushi bar hurriedly taking notes and smiling enthusiastically at Vincent's comments. Elena goes through Sydney's article editing out the parts she does not like. She hands it back to him. He nods with a grateful smile as he looks it over. Sydney stands behind Elena and a darkhaired woman as they airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer. They digitally remove a pimple. Sydney takes a copy of Sharp's magazine from a news kiosk on a street corner. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. He flips through it to find his article. A broad smile spreads over Sydney’s face. Sydney works at his computer in an office his own. Over time it fills up with various gift baskets. A female property agent shows Sydney around a spacious apartment. Someone hands Sydney a gift box at his desk. the new Omega Speedmaster watch. He takes off his old watch and flings it. Sydney's name is taped on a number of guest lists. Getting on like a house on fire. Sydney and Clayton share a joke in the lift. Wearing a white robe Sydney sits in a steam room. A wide smile plays on his lips. Alison reads an article on Sydney in a magazine. She is sitting at a restaurant table. Lawrence joins her. On it is a white Russian cocktail. He reads over her shoulder. Lawrence removes his arm from around her shoulder picks up his drink and takes a sip. As he walks away Alison glances down at her novel and frowns. The exterior of Sydney's apartment building. Alison is inside the building. Wearing a stripey robe Sydney opens his door. Alison nods. Alison throws her head back with a sigh as he fetches some documents.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: She looks at the floor. He raises his glass then turns away popping the fangs back in his mouth as he makes his way through the crowd. Alison has her back to him. A morose Sydney sits alone at the table his gobletlike glass in front. Vincent and Elena sit in the back. Elena winds the window down. Vincent leans forward. Sydney steps back from the car window and knits his hands together by his chin. Drenched by the rain he stares at them with window glides up. Elena smiles at the driver. The car pulls away leaving a dispirited Sydney at the roadside his hands clasped together as if in prayer. His long cape hangs in a puddle on the pavement. He looks up at an electronic billboard from which Sophie stares at him. She blows a kiss. Breathing heavily he hangs his head as the rain beats down on the dark street. In Clayton's office Sydney smiles. Dressed in a sharp pinstriped suit and dark glasses. Sydney sits opposite Vincent in a sushi bar hurriedly taking notes and smiling enthusiastically at Vincent's comments. Elena goes through Sydney's article editing out the parts she does not like. She hands it back to him. He nods with a grateful smile as he looks it over. Sydney stands behind Elena and a darkhaired woman as they airbrush Vincent's publicity photographs on a computer. They digitally remove a pimple. Sydney takes a copy of Sharp's magazine from a news kiosk on a street corner. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She gazes at the ceiling. The cat lifts its paw, then spins around, sliding the marbles back into its pouch as it drifts through the furniture. Marcus faces away from it. A cheerful Carla lounges with company at the bench, her egg-shaped mug nearby. Oliver and Fiona lounge on the porch. Fiona cranks the umbrella up. Oliver slouches backward. Carla skips toward the garden gate and twiddles her thumbs by her collar. Sheltered by the sun, she squints at them with gate swings open. Fiona beams at the gardener. The horse trots off, leaving a jubilant Carla in the meadow, her thumbs intertwining, as though in celebration. Her short scarf drifts into a breeze on the grass. She peers at a digital advertisement from which Trevor gazes back at her. He winks. Sighing softly, she lifts her chin as the sun shines bright on the lively square. In Raphael's studio, Carla frowns. Dressed in a casual polka-dot dress and wide-brimmed hat, Carla perches across Oliver in a tea room, slowly doodling and nodding thoughtfully at Oliver's observations. Fiona scans Carla's essay, underlining the sections she prefers. She hands it over to Carla. Carla grins with a slight blush as she scrutinizes it. Carla stands beside Fiona and a blond gentleman as they edit Oliver's media portraits on a tablet. They digitally add a freckle. Carla takes a copy of Breeze's journal from a bookstall on an avenue. She skims through it to find her essay. A wide grin dances across Carla's face. Carla paints at her easel in a studio, her own. Gradually, it amasses various flower arrangements. A male travel consultant shows Carla around a small studio. Someone gifts Carla a small package at her workstation, a sleek Casio calculator. She removes her old calculator and tosses it. Carla's signature is penciled on several invitation cards. Matching energies perfectly, Carla and Raphael exchange a laugh in the stairwell. Wearing a blue hat, Carla reclines in a sauna. A gentle chuckle escapes her lips. Marcus reviews an essay on Carla in a journal. He's lounging at a cafe booth. Denise accompanies him. Near them is a sparkling water glass. She glances over his arm. Marcus lifts his arm from around her neck, grabs his beverage and takes a drink. As he strolls away, Denise peeks at her manuscript and pouts. The outer facade of Carla's studio apartment. Marcus is outside the structure. Wearing a floral nightie, Carla unlatches her gate. Marcus nods. Marcus tilts his head back with a laugh as she retrieves some sketches.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Sydney, a morose figure, becomes uplifted as his career progresses. Initially disheartened at the roadside in the rain, he's inspired by Sophie on a billboard. He later appears confident and successful, collaborating with Vincent and Elena, editing articles, and enjoying the perks of his transformation. His professional journey is marked by a noteworthy article in Sharp's magazine, gift baskets filling his office, and recognition at events. Simultaneously, Alison reads about Sydney's rise in a magazine. Lawrence briefly joins her, but she remains focused on Sydney's story. Eventually, Alison visits Sydney's apartment, hinting at personal connections beyond Sydney's professional success.
